sourcesContent:
<app-home *ngIf="pageName === 'home'"></app-home>
<app-generate-otp
  (getMail)="getEmail($event)"
  *ngIf="pageName === 'generateOTP'"
></app-generate-otp>
<app-verify-otp
  (getOtp)="getOTP($event)"
  *ngIf="pageName === 'verifyOTP'"
></app-verify-otp>
import { Component } from '@angular/core';
import { AxiosService } from 'src/services/Axios.service';

@Component({
  selector: 'app-root',
  templateUrl: './app.component.html',
  styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'],
})
export class AppComponent {
  title = 'OTP System';
  email = '';
  OTP = '';
  pageName = 'generateOTP';

  constructor(private axios: AxiosService) {}

  getEmail(generateData: { mailID: string }) {
    this.email = generateData.mailID;
    this.pageName = 'verifyOTP'
  }
  getOTP(verifyData: { OTP: string }) {
    this.OTP = verifyData.OTP;
    this.axios.verifyOtpCall(this.email, this.OTP).res
  }
}
